items.title: Jewellery Design Using Blender 2.9 Parametric Smart Objects
items.headline: Create personalised jewellery for 3D Printing with no investment in equipment or software (Open Source & Free).
objectives_summary: Students will learn how easy it is to use 3D design software (Blender 2.9) to create personalised jewellery using Parametric Smart Objects.
Students will also learn how to add gems to their jewellery using the addon JewelCraft.
Students will also learn about the difference between FDM (plastic printing) and DLP (wax printing) machines and the slicing software that is used to print models to these different machines.
